languageKey.label: Stop words lists
Lists of words that should be either included (white list) or excluded (black list)
Note that the stop words lists do nothing all by themselves. They are meant to be used by extensions.
Hide a list to deactivate it
Some significant name or label for the list
Choose white for a list of words to include, choose black for a list of words to exclude.
Enter a list of words.
Words can be entered on several lines. Several words can also be entered on a single line, separated by commas.
